00029 Predator* SwampEnvironment::createPredator(const string& type, const string& name, const hgeVector& pos)
00030 {
00031     if (predators.find(name) == predators.end())
00032     {
00033         if (type == "Alligator")
00034         {
00035             predators[name] = new Predator(name, "Alligator");
00036             Predator* pred = predators[name];
00037             pred->setBehaviorFamily("Ambush");
00038             pred->setBehaviorState(PASSIVE);
00039             pred->setHungerTime(1000);
00040             pred->setStarvationTime(3000);
00041             pred->setSpeed(20);
00042             pred->setCamoflauge(.6);
00043             pred->setStealth(.7);
00044             pred->setWeight(200);
00045             pred->setHearingDistance(150);
00046             pred->setSightAngle(120);
00047             pred->setSightDistance(800);
00048             pred->setMaxAttackDistance(40);
00049             pred->setPosition(pos);
00050 
00051             pred->constructRenderables("alligator", "PredatorPointer", hgeColor(0.2, 0.2, 1.0, 0.8), hgeColor(1, 0, 0, 1));
00052 
00053             return pred;
00054         }
00055         else if (type == "Black Bear")
00056         {
00057             predators[name] = new Predator(name, "BlackBear");
00058             Predator* pred = predators[name];
00059             pred->setBehaviorFamily("Aggressive");
00060             pred->setBehaviorState(PASSIVE);
00061             pred->setHungerTime(700);
00062             pred->setStarvationTime(1000);
00063             pred->setSpeed(30);
00064             pred->setCamoflauge(.2);
00065             pred->setStealth(.2);
00066             pred->setWeight(500);
00067             pred->setHearingDistance(300);
00068             pred->setSightAngle(60);
00069             pred->setSightDistance(250);
00070             pred->setMaxAttackDistance(30);
00071             pred->setPosition(pos);
00072 
00073             pred->constructRenderables("blackbear", "PredatorPointer", hgeColor(0.2, 0.2, 1.0, 0.8), hgeColor(1, 0, 0, 1));
00074             return pred;
00075         }
00076         else if (type == "Bobcat")
00077         {
00078             predators[name] = new Predator(name, "Bobcat");
00079             Predator* pred = predators[name];
00080             pred->setBehaviorFamily("Feline");
00081             pred->setBehaviorState(PASSIVE);
00082             pred->setHungerTime(700);
00083             pred->setStarvationTime(1000);
00084             pred->setSpeed(70);
00085             pred->setCamoflauge(.4);
00086             pred->setStealth(.7);
00087             pred->setWeight(75);
00088             pred->setHearingDistance(450);
00089             pred->setSightAngle(50);
00090             pred->setSightDistance(950);
00091             pred->setMaxAttackDistance(30);
00092             pred->setPosition(pos);
00093 
00094             pred->constructRenderables("bobcat", "PredatorPointer", hgeColor(0.2, 0.2, 1.0, 0.8), hgeColor(1, 0, 0, 1));
00095             return pred;
00096         }
00097         else
00098         {
00099             Utils::get()->writeFormattedToLog("Environment [%s] does not handle Predator type [%s], returning NULL.", true, getType().c_str(), type.c_str());
00100             return NULL;
00101         }
00102     }
00103     else
00104     {
00105         Utils::get()->writeToLog("Predator with name [" + name + "] already exists, returning the previously existing Predator.");
00106         return predators[name];
00107     }
00108 }

00110 Prey* SwampEnvironment::createPrey(const string& type, const string& name, const hgeVector& pos)
00111 {
00112     if (prey.find(name) == prey.end())
00113     {
00114         if (type == "Deer")
00115         {
00116             prey[name] = new Prey(name, "Deer");
00117             Prey* animal = prey[name];
00118             animal->setBehaviorFamily("Alert");
00119             animal->setBehaviorState(PASSIVE);
00120             animal->setSpeed(70);
00121             animal->setCamoflauge(.2);
00122             animal->setStealth(.6);
00123             animal->setWeight(120);
00124             animal->setHearingDistance(450);
00125             animal->setSightAngle(90);
00126             animal->setSightDistance(250);
00127             animal->setPosition(pos);
00128 
00129             animal->constructRenderables("deer", "PreyPointer", hgeColor(0.2, 1.0, .2, 0.8), hgeColor(1, 1, 0, 1));
00130             return animal;
00131         }
00132         else if (type == "Possum")
00133         {
00134             prey[name] = new Prey(name, "Possum");
00135             Prey* animal = prey[name];
00136             animal->setBehaviorFamily("Defensive");
00137             animal->setBehaviorState(PASSIVE);
00138             animal->setSpeed(25);
00139             animal->setCamoflauge(.2);
00140             animal->setStealth(.7);
00141             animal->setWeight(20);
00142             animal->setHearingDistance(100);
00143             animal->setSightAngle(45);
00144             animal->setSightDistance(500);
00145             animal->setPosition(pos);
00146 
00147             animal->constructRenderables("possum", "PreyPointer", hgeColor(0.2, 1.0, .2, 0.8), hgeColor(1, 1, 0, 1));
00148             return animal;
00149         }
00150         else if (type == "Rabbit")
00151         {
00152             prey[name] = new Prey(name, "Rabbit");
00153             Prey* animal = prey[name];
00154             animal->setBehaviorFamily("Careful");
00155             animal->setBehaviorState(PASSIVE);
00156             animal->setSpeed(40);
00157             animal->setCamoflauge(.2);
00158             animal->setStealth(.4);
00159             animal->setWeight(15);
00160             animal->setHearingDistance(150);
00161             animal->setSightAngle(75);
00162             animal->setSightDistance(200);
00163             animal->setPosition(pos);
00164 
00165             animal->constructRenderables("rabbit", "PreyPointer", hgeColor(0.2, 1.0, .2, 0.8), hgeColor(1, 1, 0, 1));
00166             return animal;
00167         }
00168         else
00169         {
00170             Utils::get()->writeFormattedToLog("Environment [%s] does not handle Prey type [%s], returning NULL.", true, getType().c_str(), type.c_str());
00171             return NULL;
00172         }
00173     }
00174     else
00175     {
00176         Utils::get()->writeToLog("Prey with name [" + name + "] already exists, returning the previously existing Prey.");
00177         return prey[name];
